WRITING.TITLE: My RTT Ping spike to 500 and makes the game unplayable
WRITING.TEXT:
Hey guys,
Just wondering if anybody know how to fix anything? Yes, I already posted on the Blizzard Tech Support forum with all the available dxdiag, WinMRT to show my ping spiking but still no response.
RTT ping = my connection ping communication to the game's server.
I am on wired connection for my internet.
So what's happening is that whenever I go into an online match, my RTT ping spike from 200(which is already hella high to 500) which makes my FPS go to 1 which makes it unplayable. I can play the game on Ultra High with no lag against 6 bots so it's only multiplayer.
Now I am not playing from North Pole, I am playing from West Coast of Canada.
The steps I already tried:
Reinstalling my Nvidia drivers and cleaned it incase it was corrupted, it wasn't the software issue.
Power cycled my computer, my internet connection(I am on wired connection) and flushed my DNS.
Just tried a game and it still exist after they had a maintenance on their hardware.
Any idea how I can solve this?

WRITING.TITLE: Mark cuban on league of legends -IEM San Jose - Interview
Question about my FPS horrid drop in multiplayer
WRITING.TEXT:
So, I have a question about why my FPS drop is happening.
I can play on Ultra/Epic on Overwatch against 6 bots with no FPS issue and no lag but when I get into multiplayer game it drops down to 5,10 and my sound starts to get choppy and it's unplayable.
So I thought maybe it's my graphics setting? I lowered it through the settings all the way to low and still choppy which doesn't make sense.
My graphic card driver is up to date, I have 660 I don't have other specs on file since I am not at my computer. Again like the specs recommended I put the settings on Medium and still choppy and unplayable FPS drop.
Just want to give a comparison because I can play any of the Blizzard games on ultra high with no issues, I played Battlefront beta on Ultra as well with no FPS issue.
What could be the cause of this? If it was my CPU, I feel like I wouldn't be able to play Overwatch coop AI with no lag or Battlefront.
My ping in game for Overwatch is 100~

Experience with Fun.com's customer support!
WRITING.TEXT:
Hey guys,
Just sharing my experience with Fun.com customer support live chat.
Very pleasant, I opened up a live chat to talk about my recent order Metallic Baymax that came with some damage and bad paint job and also to talk about the 15% discount on my order since it was a pre-order they had to apply it after.
They applied the 15% discount on my card and called to confirm right after the chat and they offered me a full refund on my Metallic Baymax or offered me a replacement without even asking for pictures and also let me keep the one that I currently have.
Pretty awesome! Of course I was ready to provide pics but their customer support is on par with Amazon's customer support! Very surprised!
I know a lot of you guys had issues with how they were shipped, my Baymax came with some paper on the side but still came damaged on 1 side, my Marty came in perfect condition even though he was in a fit box but doesn't hurt to chat them up!

[GIVEAWAY] Starcraft II Heart of the Swarm Standard Edition code!
WRITING.TEXT:
Hey guys, MODS APPROVED GIVEAWAY
I had Starcraft II Heart of the Swarm Standard Edition and I upgraded it to Collector Edition so Blizzard CS gave me a standard edition key that I overrode that I can give to a friend.
Shoutout to Blizzard for this giveaway!
I want to give out to players that haven't tried the Heart of the Swarm campaign yet! So tell all your friends about this.
I will be picking a winner Sunday, **October 4th** after I end the giveaway at **10:00PM MST**.
**Here are the rules!**
1) No giveaway accounts. Accounts with real comment history. Lurkers are welcome but all accounts must be at least 3 months old!
2) Pick a # from 1-500 and also post a screenshot of your battle.net desktop app at the Starcraft tab to show you don't have the Heart of the Swarm Standard Edition!
Good luck guys!
WINNER IS /u/MeepMoops! Here is the drawing video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=b67sQCatCBM feature=youtu.be

Just watched the season finale.
I honestly though Derrick was a shoe in for the masterchef title honestly, the way the season was edited was perfect for Derek's rise to masterchef just like all the past seasons were edited.

Amazon has done it again with their great customer service - Amazon exclusive FO Stormtrooper -Amazon.ca order
WRITING.TEXT:
Amazon has done it again!
Update on the Amazon exclusive Stormtrooper order issue on amazon.ca
I decided to chat Amazon.ca because I placed the order for it when the pops first went up on August 10th and they still don't have a delivery date for it yet.
So I talked to the guy and I informed him about the item being in stock on amazon.com and people actually receiving the item.
So the amazon.ca guy transferred me over to amazon.com customer service and they waived the shipping cost so I got Global Priority shipping for free and now my items will be coming faster!
Got to love Amazon customer service even over different platforms!
Extremely happy, other companies need to follow Amazon in their customer service department

Toy Tokyo Exclusive B W and GITD Ghost Glow Godzillas! Reposted with Glams!
A few things I found out about the first run of the Forced Awakened pops!
WRITING.TEXT:
It seems to be a really good quantity run of the commons.
A lot of commons and the HT exclusive Rey but other exclusives are more limited.
The paint jobs are not that great in this first run, especially on the Stormtrooper and Stormtrooper Fin, it was horrid trying to find the decent paint job. I had to hit 3 EB games to get the best Stormtrooper Fin.
Details on the new pops are great but I wish the paint job would be much better but nothing we can do about it since it's made in a factory.
Love the new First Order Stormtrooper line though, they look bad ass!
Hopefully next runs will be better quality!
Overall people should be patient over these! There will be tons and tons of these over the next months for the movie and after the movie.
**P.S** No Dewbacks in Canada Walmart yet but it has other exclusives!
Happy hunting!

Z Nation Season 2 Synopsis
WRITING.TEXT:
Z Nation's Season 2 picks up mere moments after the nukes launch and its every man for him or herself when the team splits up and tries to outrun the impending blast. Meanwhile, in the Arctic, Citizen Z (DJ Qualls) finds himself battling thawed zombies and unable to communicate with the team.
In a desperate attempt to help them out on their quest to get to California and the CDC, Citizen Z issues an on air bounty for Murphy. Suddenly everyone wants a piece of The Murphy, including a mysterious and deadly bounty hunter named Vasquez (Matt Cedeo).

[SPOILERS!] ____'s Arrow Appearance Will Have Big Impact On DC's Legends of Tomorrow
Constantine's Arrow Appearance Will Have Big Impact On DC's Legends of Tomorrow
Arrow's Constantine Episode Details Revealed - Episode 5 of Arrow!
Here is a big tip for Constantine fans that don't watch Arrow or Flash!
WRITING.TEXT:
Get started on those two shows even if just summary of S1 and S2 of Arrow and watch fully of S3 of Arrow and S1 of Flash!
Episode 5 of Arrow is when Constantine will appear! http://comicbook.com/2015/08/11/arrows-constantine-episode-details-revealed/
They aren't perfect but they are a great show and is in an interesting universe.
With Matt Ryan joining the CW DC Universe, they are testing the waters first with Arrow and we will need to show them that Constantine is something we all want in the future of CW network as his standalone show so we will all need to be prepare to spike up the viewer and ratings once the episode air.
If you don't watch the other shows, prep up and lets get Constantine back on the screen with Matt Ryan!

WRITING.TITLE: Matt Ryan to Reprise 'Constantine' Role on The CW's 'Arrow'
